Section.Title: Use in Cancer

ItemizedList.ListItem: liposarcoma or leiomyosarcoma (types of soft tissue sarcoma) that cannot be removed by surgery or has spread to other parts of the body. It is used in patients who have already been treated with anthracycline chemotherapy

Section.Para: Trabectedin is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
